title: E-commerce Cart
description: An E-commerce store restricted to a products page and a checkout modal. There is also a filter system which displays prodcuts according to price, price range, rating and alphabetical order.

title: Drawing App
description: A Drawing App with shape tools. The width of lines can be changed and the last line/shape drawn can be undone.

title: Noughts and Crosses
description: A Noughts and crosses game written in vanilla javascript. Player scores can be tracked and the game can be reset by clicking the reset button.

title: Meme Generator
description: A react meme generator utilising the Meme Api. Text can be entered into the top and bottom of the image, new memes can be generated by clicking the 'Get new image' button.

title: Task Tracker
description: A react task tracker. New tasks can be added by clicking the 'Add' button. Once tasks are saved reminder can be added or removed by double clicking on the saved task.

title: Weather Search App
description: An app which searches the weather through the Open Weather API. Enter a city or country, click search and the app will display weather, temperature, humidity and wind speed in that location.

title: Solar System Animation
description: A solar system animation. The orbital speed of the planets can be changed, the default speed is 1 second for 1 Earth day. Interesting facts about the planets can be seen in the drop down menu on the right.

title: Animated introduction
description: Kick back and watch an animated introduction made using the GSAP framework.

title: React calculator
description: A calculator app made in React. It utilises context API and the reducer hook.
